    Cover machine

    CT100

    • Pressure stability
    • Pressing time control
    • Automatic mechanical control arm
    • 3.5 inches touch panel

    • If the electrochemical sensor development enters the production stage, you can try our coating machine and attach the hydrophilic cap for your sensor.It can not only increase the stability and life of the electrode, but also control the amount of sample absorption and improve the detection accuracy and precision.

    LCD Control3.5" Touch Panel
    Pressure Range10~100kg
    Time Setting1~9999s
    Working Room450mm 2 / 13.5mm(H)
    Weight11kg
    Size330/210/500mm(L/W/H)
    Power Requirement110/ 240 VAC , 50/ 60Hz
    Weight500g
    Nominal operatingvoltage110-240 V, 50-60 Hz , 0.25 A
